1.0.1.name: connect20/Auguria_Sponsorship
1.0.1.description:
This module allows customers to earn fidelity and sponsorship points.
Customers can invit friends on your site and when their friends buy products, they earn sponsorship points. If a godchild sponsor a person, the sponsor will earn a percentage too.
When customers buy, they can win fidelity points. 
These points can then be exchanged against cash, discounts or gifts (not yet implemented).

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
